talked.text: Get lost. I don't have anything to talk with you.

mean.text: What are you looking at? Say something or leave

choices.text: I've been told about you and Alex speaking of some prank.

warnNormal.text: Damn, you caught us, it was silly.
But it's not funny anymore, we won't do it.

talked.text: I've already talked to Maria. I should look for people in the playground waiting for the bell to ring.

notMetChoices.text: Say hello. I always see you alone and reading.

niceResponse.text: People don't use to talk to me.

ignore.text: If you don't mind...(She ignores you and keeps reading)

warn.text: I've heard Alex talking to Ana about playing you a joke.
I don't know what might be, but be careful, they aren't usually very funny.

notTalked.text: Have you seen that mobile app that checks your relationship with the people you talk more?
It tells you who you get along with or not of all the people that downloaded it.
It's said it is really accurate, but how it works isn't clear.
I've seen you already have it.
